name: Fighter Resiliency
prereq: Fighter Dedication; Class Granting No More Hit Points Per Level Than 8 + Your Constitution Modifier
summary: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each fighter archetype class feat you have.
description:
You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each fighter archetype class feat you have. As you continue selecting fighter archetype class feats, you continue to gain additional Hit Points in this way.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
